name: school-management-system
description: A comprehensive School Management System built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) with TypeScript

scripts.postinstall: node -e "if (!process.env.INSTALL_ALL) { console.log('Running install:all'); require('child_process').execSync('npm run install:all', { stdio: 'inherit', env: { ...process.env, INSTALL_ALL: 'true' } }); } else { console.log('Skipping install:all to prevent recursion'); }"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
